sendMessages.label: Urugero rw'uruhusha rusabwa kugira ngo ubutumwa
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 bisigura ko abagize umuryango bose bashobora kohereza ubutumwa, kandi uko umubare usobanura ko hakenewe uruhusha rwo hejuru .

invite.label: Urugero rw'ukwinjira rusabwa kugira ngo rutumire abagize umuryango mushasha .
invite.tooltip: Ni nde ashobora gutumira abashasha mu cumba

kick.label: Ushireho urugero rw'uruhusha rusabwa
kick.tooltip: Ni nde ashobora gukuraho abagize icumba

ban.label: Urugero rw'injira rukenewe kugira ngo abanywanyi
ban.tooltip: Ni nde ashobora kubuza abagize icumba

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Urugero rw'urugero rw'injira: 0-100, uko umubare munini usobanura uruhusha rwo hejuru
